doc.field: Manuals: NYC building code and multiple dwelling law, various other NYC reference manuals and guide re: fire prevention (high rises, inspection forms, public assembly (such as concerts). DVD (2005) introduction to new AFID inspection forms and reference book (related paper guides too). Digest of NY state Labor Law, heavily annotated, with course outlines (1968, circa 1982). Building Code Digest also heavily annotated and appears tied to coursework (1970s). "Civilian LPPA" binder of reference material, appears to be related to presentation or coursework. Some child-oriented print matter for recruiting and safety. Presentation "Navigating the NYC Dept of Buildings: Building Information System" (2007). (Includes digital formats)
